Detailed Description

Organize OS-Modules Save.

Date:
Wed Jul 21 16:08:28 2010

Read 'modules.pcimap' and Organize storing of OS-pcimap_list into database.

int os_pci_module ( OsInfo  osInfo,
string  pcimapFile 
)

Organize saving of OS-pcimap_list in database.

Read the 'modules.pcimap' list into device_list variable. And call the function store_pci_map() for storing OS-pcimap_list.

Parameters:
osInfo Object holding the OS information.
pcimapFile Path to file representing 'modules.pcimap' in Server.
Returns:
Success status
  • 0 -> (SUCCESS)
  • 1 -> (FAIL)
